column1: # pKa Values Compiled by by R. Williams
# "Substituent" is the position and structure of the substituent
# "BzOH pKa" is acidity of substituted BENZOIC ACIDS in water
# "PhOH pKa" is acidity of substituted PHENOLS in water
# "Aniline pKa" is acidity of substituted ANILINESS in water
# "Dimethylaniline pKa" is acidity of substituted N
# "Pyridine pKa" is acidity of substituted PYRIDINESS in water
# Errors are possible. Refer to original document for confirmation
# NOTE: csv files are not compatible with comments.
